sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { FaMapMarkerAlt, FaCalendarDay, FaMale, FaPlus } from 'react-icons/fa'
import { DropdownComponent } from '../../components/dropdown'
import { InputFrom } from '../../components/inputForm'

import {
  AddButton,
  AddButtonContainer,
  CardBody,
  CardContainer,
  CardForm,
  CardFormInputs,
  CardHeader,
  CardTitle,
  SearchButton,
  SectionSearch,
} from './styles'

export const Home: React.FC = () => {
  const formRef = React.useRef<HTMLFormElement>(null)

  const handleAddNewFormField = (): void => {
    formRef.current?.appendChild(
      <InputFrom
        type='text'
        name='origin'
        label='City of origin'
        icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
      />
    )
  }

  return (
    <SectionSearch>
      <CardContainer>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle>Trip</CardTitle>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardBody>
          <CardForm ref={formRef}>
            <CardFormInputs>
              <InputFrom
                type='text'
                name='origin'
                label='City of origin'
                icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
              />

              <InputFrom
                type='text'
                name='destiny'
                label='City of destination'
                icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
              />

              <InputFrom
                type='text'
                name='trip-date'
                label='Date of the trip'
                icon={<FaCalendarDay size={24} />}
              />

              <InputFrom
                type='number'
                name='passengers'
                label='Number of passengers'
                icon={<FaMale size={24} />}
              />
            </CardFormInputs>
            <AddButtonContainer>
              <AddButton onClick={handleAddNewFormField}>
                <FaPlus size={12} />
                Add intermediate city
              </AddButton>
            </AddButtonContainer>
            <SearchButton>Search</SearchButton>
          </CardForm>
        </CardBody>
      </CardContainer>
    </SectionSearch>
  )
}
